Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Aparthotel Tropic Garden in Santa Eulalia del Rio, you'll be on the beach and convenient to Puig de Missa and Punta Arabi Hippy Market. This 4-star aparthotel is within the vicinity of Las Dalias Hippy Market and Golf Club Ibiza.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 225 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and sofa beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a sauna.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Aparthotel Tropic Garden. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a computer station, and a 24-hour front desk. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Aparthotel Tropic Garden. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Puig de Missa - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Punta Arabi Hippy Market - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Las Dalias Hippy Market - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Golf Club Ibiza - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Sa Torreta - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
San Rafael Racetrack - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi
Marina Botafoch - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi
Sacred Heart of Jesus Statue - 11.8 km / 7.3 mi
Faro de Punta Grossa - 12 km / 7.5 mi
Port of Ibiza - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi
Sant Rafel Church - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi
Ibiza Museum of Contemporary Art - 12.9 km / 8 mi
Teatro Pereyra - 12.9 km / 8 mi
Archaeological Museum of Ibiza - 13 km / 8.1 mi
Ibiza Cathedral - 13.1 km / 8.1 mi

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Tropic Garden is Ibiza (IBZ) - 19.7 km / 12.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Tropic Garden is Ibiza (IBZ) - 18.7 km / 11.6 mi.
